fields_of_interest: Trade, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations
eu_initiatives:
eu foreign policy towards Asia, monitoring/input on FTAs with Japan, Singapore, Vietnam, Thailand, Philippines, Australia and NZ;  FTA with India; monitoring of FTA, SPA and CSDP agreements with ROK, monitoring of EU-China investment agreement. 
We also input into the EEAS strategy towards Asia
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
relevant_communication:
we hold regular briefings and discussions with EU officials and MEPs on EU relations with Japan, China, ROk, India, ASEAN. 
We are involved in the EU's approach towards ASEAN on issues such as maritime security, participating in EEAS seminars in Jajarta and Kuala Lumpur. 
We have regular events involving EU officials and MEPs on all aspects of policy towards Asia 
We organise events for Asian missions in Brussels to promote their bilateral relations with the EU.  
We use our website and briefings papers to maintain a steady stream of information on EU-Asia relations to EU officials and MEPs. 
We are involved in a number of EU-funded projects such as the DAI public diplomacy contract promoting public diplomacy between the EU and India.
goals__remit: To undertake research and organise events on EU-Asia relations; to participate in seminars and conferences in the EU and Asia, plus the US and Canada, on these themes.
